results.title: Rikki-tikki-tavi
results.creator_credit: Chuck Jones and Chuck Jones Enterprises
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Kipling classic from ‘The jungle books’”.
An animated version of Rudyard Kipling’s tale of a mongoose who is saved from a storm by a boy and his parents, and then becomes the family’s defender against the dreaded cobras that roam the compound. Narrated by Orson Welles. Teacher’s notes accompany the video.

results.title: Rio Lobo (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Howard Hawks, Howard Hawks Productions and Malabar Productions
results.brief_description: John Wayne portrays a former Union officer searching for a traitor in this post-Civil War action drama directed by Howard Hawks. The war is over, but Col. Cord McNally (Wayne) is still hunting the informer who caused the death of a young officer. His quest brings him to the town of Rio Lobo, where he joins forces with two ex-rebels, helps save this small piece of Texas from ruthless outlaws, and finally comes face to face with his quarry. Featuring Jennifer O’Neil, Chris Mitcham and Jack Elam, this film brings together the talents of two Western legends.

results.title: River (Planet earth)
results.creator_credit: Peter Raymont, Planet Earth and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Takes a look at the Saskatchewan-Nelson river system in order to examine the impact which a water system has upon the economy, sociology and ecology of a nation.

results.title: The White seal
results.creator_credit: Chuck Jones and Chuck Jones Enterprises
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Kipling classic from ‘The jungle books’”.
Based on a tale in Kipling’s “The Jungle Book”, this exciting animated film follows the exploits of Kotick, the white seal, as he struggles to survive and save his friends from seal hunters in the Bering Sea. Narrated by Roddy McDowall to music from Beethoven’s Sixth Symphony. Teacher’s notes accompany the video.

results.title: Rites
results.brief_description: Female circumcision, a euphemism for genital mutilation, is inflicted on an estimated 75-85 million women across the world. It is most widely practised in 26 African countries, the Middle East, Malaysia, Indonesia and some parts of South America. This program confronts the taboos surrounding such mutilations which serve mainly to control the sexual freedom of women. It includes interviews with victims of these painful practices and women attempting to change the custom.

results.title: Mowgli's brothers
results.creator_credit: Chuck Jones, Xerox Films and Chuck Jones Enterprises
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Kipling classic from ‘The jungle books’”.
Animated version of Kipling’s classic tale of a boy rescued and raised by wolves in the jungles of India comes alive in this film about love, justice and loyalty. Features the voices of Roddy McDowall and June Foray. Teacher’s notes accompany the video. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.

results.title: Rio Bravo(Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Howard Hawks, Armada Productions and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: Sheriff John T. Chance arrests a gunslinger for a brutal murder. However, the outlaw’s brother is the most powerful rancher on the border and his desperadoes surround Rio Bravo so that Chance can’t get his prisoner out and the U.S. Marshall can’t get in. Hired gunmen slip silently into the little town, waiting for a chance to strike. This classic western combines the talents of John Wayne and Dean Martin with the much acclaimed skill of Howard Hawks.

results.title: Rise
results.brief_description: ‘Rise’ is a revealing look at the lives contained within a Melbourne Housing Commission estate. Set against the backdrop of a high-rise building, this is a visual account of a largely unknown environment: as the camera moves through the building, a series of portraits unfolds, telling the stories of people from a wide range of cultural backgrounds. In the context of high density living, ‘Rise’ is a celebration of the individual.
